    • showAudioBooksNamesOrdered

      public void showAudioBooksNamesOrdered​(java.lang.String orderedOrNot)

      Parameters:

    • getAudioBookIndex

      public int getAudioBookIndex​(java.lang.String thisAudioBook) throws business.NotAnExistingAudioBook
      Method that returns the audiobook's index
      Parameters:
      thisAudioBook - The audiobook whose index we want to find in the list Util of audiobooks
      Returns:
      The index of the audiobook wanted
      Throws:
      business.NotAnExistingAudioBook - If the parameter entered by the user is not an existing audiobook
